/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A red truck, vibrant against the muted colors of the surroundings, is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of nature and urban life.
